channel.title: Projects on Wesley Tian
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Wesley Tian

item.title: Saving Lives with Machine Learning
item.description: Summary: Work in progress. Teammates: Shengpu Tang, Dr. Jenna Wiens More updates coming soon!

item.title: Deep Learning with Residual Blocks
item.description: Summary: Lead team of undergraduate and graduate students to replicate results of the Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition research paper. Team: Cory Laban https://arxiv.org/pdf/1512.03385.pdf More updates coming soon!

item.title: My Own Cryptocurrency
item.description: Overview: Cryptocurrency built in Selenium on the Ethereum blockchain. Blockchain @ Michigan Workshop GitHub Repo: https://github.com/wesleytian/WesTCoin

item.title: My First Machine Learning Competition
item.description: More updates coming soon! Summary: https://sites.google.com/view/assistmentsdatamining/home?authuser=0 Placed 3rd out of 74 research teams. Technologies: Python Teammates: Samuel Tenka The first place winning team of Chun Kit Yeung, Kai Yang, and Dit-yan Yeung is from the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. They used a state-of- the-art “Deep Knowledge Tracing” model to predict student performance, combined with boosting algorithms. Prof. Yeung said, “It was great to participate in this challenge and to be recognized.

item.title: Presenting to 3 Senior Vice Presidents of Fidelity Investments
item.description: More updates coming soon! Summary: Helped build an internal interviewer-interviewee scheduler. 6 internal teams competed. 1 won. Won an $100 Amazon Gift Card. Teammates: Mike Super, Akhil Yerra, etc.

item.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors AI
item.description: Summary: Command line AI that uses your play history to predict your next move in a game of Rock, Paper, Scissors. Uses the Bayes Rule. Uses: Java Table of Contents Context What I Learned How it Works Operating Instructions Context: What I Learned: How it Works: Operating Instructions: Clone the file. git clone https://github.com/wesleytian/roshambo-god Navigate to the cloned repository. cd roshambo-god Compile the file.

item.title: I Won $2000
item.description: More updates coming soon! Summary: Submitted to Hamp Hack 2017 Won most creative use of Indico API Awarded $2000/team member in API credits Teammates: Nischal Tamang and Phillip Michalowski Devpost: https://devpost.com/software/fashion-filtr

item.title: Baby Tracker
item.description: More updates coming soon! Summary: Parse Baby Berk’s Twitter feed to gather current location of the food truck and display it on a map. Teammates: Phillip Michalowski and Nischal Tamang

item.title: A CSP Parser for AISpace
item.description: Summary: This script turns a CSV file into a XML file that can be imported into AIspace’s Consistency Based CSP Solver. Built using Python. The Consistency Based CSP Solver: http://www.aispace.org/downloads.shtml GitHub Repo: https://github.com/wesleytian/csv-xml-csp More updates coming soon!

item.title: $100,000 in Annual Revenue?!
item.description: Summary: Big thanks to Dr. Rui Wang for funding me the neccessary resources to build this project! More content coming soon! The Problem The Solution v0.9 v1.0 The Software Buy one here! https://rayshobby.net/wordpress/opensprinkler-bee/ GitHub Repos: Hardware: https://github.com/wesleytian/programmable-thermostat-hw Firmware: https://github.com/wesleytian/thermostat-pro Library: https://github.com/wesleytian/thermostat-pro-library Mobile App: https://github.com/wesleytian/thermostat-pro-ionic
